Package javelin.controller.action.world

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Abandon
    Quit the current game forever, delete the save game so the player can start a new campaign.
    Automate
    Configures Combatant.automatic and Squad.strategic.
    Camp
    Rest in the WorldScreen.
    CastSpells
    Cast Spells out of battle.
    ClearHighscore
    Clear highscore.
    ConfigureWorldKeys  
    Dismiss
    Allows members to be removed from a Squad at any point.
    Divide
    Split squad into two.
    Guide
    In-game help.
    Infiltrate
    Lets a unit go into an enemy Location unnoticed and perform sabotage or assassination.
    OpenJournal
    Lets a user take notes between sessions.
    Park
    Park and exit your current vehicle.
    Rename
    Rename combatant.
    ShowOptions
    Opens up a configuration dialog where the user can adjust his preferences.
    ShowStatistics
    Show unit information.
    UseItems
    Use an Item out of battle.
    WorldAction
    An action to be performed by the human player while on the overworld view.
    WorldHelp
    In-game help.
    WorldMove
    Makes a movement on the overworld or Dungeon.
    ZoomWorldIn  
    ZoomWorldOut  
  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    Work

    Error Description
    Work
